info.title: InforMEA API
info.description: InforMEA Drupal 8 API specifications for version 2.0.

get.description: Provide the list of meetings exposed to third parties

parameters.name: updated
parameters.description: Filter by the date when the object was last updated

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. Supported values: 0, 10, 50, 100. Default 10

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Return the number of results instead. Filters are applied before the count.

200.description: List of meetings matching the filter criteria

description.es: Descripción de la reunión en español
description.fr: Description de la réunion en français

title.en: Example meeting #3 - A minimal valid meeting EN

title.en: Decision #2 - Demo linking to meeting through meetingTitle

get.description: Provide the list of legislation entries

parameters.name: updated
parameters.description: Filter by the date when the object was last updated

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return. Supported values: 0, 10, 50, 100. Default 10

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Return the number of results instead. Filters are applied before the count.

200.description: List of legislation matching the filter criteria

abstract.en: This Act provides for the sustainable use of natural resources, economic development and environmental conservation.

treaties: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora
example.publicationReference: Uganda Gazette No. 49, Volume CXII, dated 27th September, 2019
example.entryIntoForceNotes: This Act enters into force on 31 July 2007.
example.faolexOrganization: Permanent Interstate Committee for Drought Control in the Sahel

treaties.description: List of MEA instruments / treaties associated with this meeting

type.description: Type of meeting in relation to the instrument

access.description: Type of access to the meeting

city.description: City where the meeting takes place

virtual.description: The meeting is virtual or not

imageUrl.description: URL of a small, representative image for the meeting, displayed by InforMEA to display a listing of the meetings.

imageCopyright.description: Copyright statement of the above image
imageCopyright.example: (c) 2008 John M. Doe. All rights reserved

latitude.description: Latitude of the event place in decimal degrees (ex. 23.456323). This value may be used to represent the event on a map using existing geographical applications such as Google Maps

longitude.description: Longitude of the event place in decimal degrees (ex. 23.456323). This value may be used to represent the event on a map using existing geographical applications such as Google Maps

updated.description: Date when record suffered last updated

Meeting.description: Meeting object. Contains all information about a meeting.

type.description: Type of the decision. Use one of the pre-defined values

status.description: Status of the decision. Use one of the predefined values

number.description: Number of the decision. It is a combination of letters and (roman) numbers

meetingTitle.description: English title of the meeting where the decision was taken. It is preffered to use meetingId if possible to link to the meeting, however if this is not possible use the meetingTitle

meetingUrl.description: URL of the meeting where the decision was taken. This may point to the MEA website where this meeting is described.

content.description: Content of the decision. This is a list of LocalizableString type objects. Conventions can store their decision in binary format such as PDF/Word, but also in database fields (text, blob). If the decision text is stored in a database, use this property to expose it.

displayOrder.description: Background: There is no common criteria across MEAs to properly order the COP/MOP decisions. The decision number varies from one Secretariat to the other, using numbering schemes such as DECISION IX/4 etc. which cannot be properly sorted. Therefore we introduce a new numerical field to handle this functionality. Each decision will have a unique number, that will be used to order the decisions (ASCENDING) properly when displayed within the front-end of the website, example: 1, 2, 3, 4. This internal string is only used for the sorting.

files.description: Decision document files - This is a list of File entities. Conventions can store their decision in binary format such as PDF/Word, but also in database fields (text, blob). If the decision text is stored in a database, use this property to expose it

keywords.description: The list of terms that are used to tag this decision. The MEAs should keep a mapping between their local vocabulary terms and the InforMEA vocabulary terms.

updated.description: Date when record suffered last updated

Decision.description: Contains metadata information & file references to a MEA decision document.

treaties.description: List of MEA instruments / treaties associated with this contact

fullName.description: Full name of the person or organization

prefix.description: Person prefix such as Mr., Dr., Ms. Etc.

type.description: Category of contact. Depict their category of contact points: “Licensed NFP” and “Non-licensed NFP”. Free string that can be added by MEAs.

address.description: Contact postal address. We encourage to include the country in address field, as for some contacts, they may reside in different country than one which is assigned to

email.description: E-mail address, only one email address possible

primary.description: Possible values 1 or 0. If 1 this contact is primary national focal point.

updated.description: Date when record suffered last updated

roles.description: List of PersonRole complex type. Person’s role related to a treaty. Background: Same person can have multiple roles for different treaties on a treaty (ie. CBD Focal point, Nagoya protocol body etc.)

order.description: This field determines the order of the person when is displayed within a list of people. Scenario: 1) Treaty profiles, a country might have multiple focal points. It might be required to display these person in certain order (ie. NFP first), therefore this field will be useful. See an example. 2) Country profile, multiple persons are displayed for a treaty. See an example.  Note: The list is ascending, smaller numbers are displayed near the top.

url.description: Record’s canonical URL on the MEA website
URL to the file to be downloaded

mimeType.description: Internet file mime-type of the file

filename.description: Filename of the file if it cannot be determined from the URL

Treaty.description: Collection of MEA identifiers defined in an ad-hoc manner by the InforMEA team

source.description: Original data source where record was taken from. Organization / MEA name

language.description: Original language. Should be the ISO code of one of the UN languages or have an abstract in English if not

country.description: ISO code of the country which submitted the legislation and where it applies.

territorialSubdivision.description: Where relevant state the specific sub-division of the country (eg Scotland, Ireland, Wales for UK; California, Texas for United States etc.)

topics.description: One or more topics that apply to this record

regulatoryApproach.description: How the problem was tackled in the law.
enum: Product standards Certification and Labeling requirements

number.description: Assigned unique identification number if available.

isAmendement.description: This record is a legislation amendment

url.description: Add URL for main website where legislation can be found

treaties.description: List of Multilateral Environment Agreements related to this record. Use full official name

keywords.description: Keyword tags to describe the item

publicationReference.description: First publication when this document appeared. Where available.

entryIntoForceNotes.description: Entry into force notes for constitution acts.

faolexOrganization.description: FAOLEX organization, associated to specific records
faolexOrganization.example: Permanent Interstate Committee for Drought Control in the Sahel

relations.description: Describes relations between this record and other records

updated.description: Date when record suffered last updated

Legislation.description: Contains metadata information & file references to a legislation record.

to.description: Identifier of the target record in this system. Empty if it does not exists and toTitle can be filled-in

toTitle.description: Title of the target record. Useful for records not existing in the system (without "to" field)

type.description: Type of document of target entity
